summary: Removes the \"You are carrying too much to be able to run\" message for those who don\'t want the reminder.
descriptionHtml:
By: JustinOther

Description: This removes the repeating \"You are carrying too much to be able to run\" message for those who don\'t need/want the reminder.

Version: 1.0

Install: Place sOverEncumbered.esp in your Skyrim\\Data directory and activate it with NMM or whatever load tool you use,

Uninstall: Delete the plugin or remove it from Plugins.txt. When there\'s a mod manager, just untick it.

Thanks: Beth and Elminster.

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: JustinOther
